trans-unit.source: Defines an interface that enables the extension of specific behaviors of an HTML control designer.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior> interface is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
Gets or sets the designer that the behavior is associated with.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner"></xref> that the behavior is associated with.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior"></xref> interface is obsolete.
Use the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView"></xref> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
Gets the element that the designer is associated with.
The object that the designer is associated with.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior"></xref> interface is obsolete.
Use the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView"></xref> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
Gets the specified attribute.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.GetAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
The attribute to retrieve.
`true` if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, `false`.
The attribute that was retrieved.
Gets the specified style attribute.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.GetStyleAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
The style attribute to retrieve.
`true` if the attribute is only active at design time; otherwise, `false`.
`true` if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, `false`.
The style attribute that was retrieved.
Removes the specified attribute.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.RemoveAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.RemoveAttribute%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
The attribute to remove.
`true` if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, `false`.
Removes the specified style attribute.
The style attribute to remove.
`true` if the attribute is only active at design time; otherwise, `false`.
`true` if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, `false`.
Sets the specified attribute to the specified object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.SetAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
The attribute to set.
The object on which to set the attribute.
`true` if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, `false`.
Sets the specified style attribute to the specified object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.SetStyleAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
The attribute to set.
`true` if the attribute is only active at design-time; otherwise, `false`.
The object to set the attribute on.
`true` if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, `false`.
